segments.text: hey , the new SOHO . How's everything going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: everything's great . I've just returned from my office .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: your office ? Aren't you a freelancer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: sure I am . I work for myself , but I've rented a virtual office at an office building in the downtown area .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yeah , an office that runs efficiently by using nothing other than online communication technologies . I pay the rent and share office services with others in the same building .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: what kind of services do they offer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: a separated office , internet access , phone services , fax services , mail & courier services , and almost everything you have in a conventional office .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I get a business address at an expensive location , and I can share the receptionist and secretary with other offices in the same floor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: oh , that helps a lot to promote your corporate image .
segments.speaker: S1
